text: Lee Cheol-woo (; born 15 August 1955), also spelled Lee Cheol-uoo, is a South Korean politician. He has been the Governor of North Gyeongsang Province since 2018. He is a member of the People Power Party. He was a member of the National Assembly of South Korea from 2008 to 2018. He was an unsuccessful candidate for President of South Korea in the 2025 snap presidential election. ==References== Category:South Korean politicians Category:Living people Category:1955 births
title: Lee Cheol-woo
